title: Elegant Five-Star Chiang Rai Riverside Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Massages
description:
Discover the wonderous beauty of Chiang Rai, a northern Thai city cradled by mountains and filled to the brim with ancient temples, spiritual sites, art and cultural experiences. Located on the banks of the Kok River, The Riverie by Katathani offers something for everyone, from outdoor pools and a mini waterpark to the calming tranquillity of Tivaa Ratrii Spa.

Enjoy a cocktail at Jujube Pool Bar before choosing which of the three restaurants to dine at: try authentic Thai plates at Blossom Restaurant where the food is surpassed only by the views, dine on mouthwatering Cantonese Dim Dum at China Garden and swim up to the Jumanji Bar for tipples against views of the Kok River.

Further afar, Chiang Rai beckons with authentic Thai experiences. Take a short drive to the ethereal Wat Rong Suea Ten or Khun temples, wander past the gardens at the Chiang Rai Walking Street and browse artisan goods at the night bazaar.
offer_address: 1129 Kraisorasit Road Vieng Maung, Chiang Rai 57000, Thailand

title: Luxurious Five-Star Anantara Thailand Retreat within Jungle Elephant Sanctuary
description: Experience Thailand like never before with a stay nestled in the lush jungle of the luxurious Anantara Golden Triangle Elephant Camp & Resort. Perched at the pinnacle of a mountain ridge, the resort is surrounded by tranquil vistas over the rolling hills of Myanmar and Laos. Its chief draw is the onsite elephant sanctuary, offering the chance for unique encounters with these incredible creatures. Add opulent dining and adventure experiences, and you have a Chiang Rai escape you'll remember forever.
location_description: Anantara Golden Triangle Elephant Camp & Resort
offer_address: 229 Moo 1, Chiang Saen, Chiang Rai 57150, Thailand
